wps:Process.ows:Title: Wave: Monthly Mean [hs,t0m1]
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: This process operates on the variables Mean Wave Direction (dir [deg]), Significant Wave Height (hs [m]) and Mean Wave Period (t0m1 [s]). Details can be found under http://dx.doi.org/10.4225/08/523168703DCC5 The Use of the process and any of its results is governed by the Creative Commons Attribution ShareAlike 3.0 Unported Licence. Reference must be given to the source and authors as stated in the relevant metadata.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Wave: Monthly Waverose
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: This process operates on the variables Mean Wave Direction (dir [deg]) and Significant Wave Height (hs [m]). Details can be found under http://dx.doi.org/10.4225/08/523168703DCC5 The Use of the process and any of its results is governed by the Creative Commons Attribution ShareAlike 3.0 Unported Licence. Reference must be given to the source and authors as stated in the relevant metadata.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Wave: Annual Waverose
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: This process operates on the variables Mean Wave Direction (dir [deg]) and Significant Wave Height (hs [m]). Details can be found under http://dx.doi.org/10.4225/08/523168703DCC5 The Use of the process and any of its results is governed by the Creative Commons Attribution ShareAlike 3.0 Unported Licence. wps:Process.ows:Title: Wave: Monthly Bivariate Probability Distribution
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: This process operates on the variables Significant Wave Height (hs [m]) and Wave Energy Period (tm0m1 [s]). It further employs a static matrix of energy distribution to calculate a probability map. Details can be found under http://dx.doi.org/10.4225/08/523168703DCC5 The Use of the process and any of its results is governed by the Creative Commons Attribution ShareAlike 3.0 Unported Licence. Reference must be given to the source and authors as stated in the relevant metadata.
